summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of Westlake Avenue, in the City of Seattle, form Denny Way to Mercer Street by planking the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 877 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
